home.name: Large Pack
home.description: Unlocks the 2nd row of inventory (12 more slots, total 24).

home.name: Deluxe Pack
home.description: Unlocks the 3rd row of inventory (12 more slots, total 36).

home.name: Catalogue
home.description: Provides unlimited access to all wallpapers and floors... from the convenience of your home!

home.name: Flooring
home.description: Decorates the floor of one room.

home.name: Rice
home.description: A basic grain often served under vegetables.

home.name: sugar
home.description: Adds sweetness to pastries and candies. Too much can be unhealthy.

home.name: Vinegar
home.description: An aged fermented liquid used in many cooking recipes.

home.name: Wheat Flour
home.description: A common cooking ingredient made from crushed wheat seeds.

seeds.name: Amaranth Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to grow. Harvest with the scythe.

seeds.name: Artichoke Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 8 days to mature.

seeds.name: Bean Starter
seeds.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 10 days to mature, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.

seeds.name: Bok Choy Seads
seeds.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 4 days to mature.

seeds.name: Cauliflower Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to produce a large cauliflower.

seeds.name: Corn Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 14 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

seeds.name: Cranberry Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

seeds.name: Eggplant Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

seeds.name: Fairy Seeds
seeds.description: Plant in fall. Takes 12 days to produce a mysterious flower. Assorted Colors.

seeds.name: Garlic Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 4 days to mature.

seeds.name: Grape Starter
seeds.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 10 days to grow, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.

seeds.name: Jazz Seeds
seeds.description: Plant in spring. Takes 7 days to produce a blue puffball flower.

seeds.name: Kale Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.

seeds.name: Parsnip Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 4 days to mature.

seeds.name: Potato Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature, and has a chance of yielding multiple potatoes at harvest.

seeds.name: Pumpkin Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 13 days to mature.

seeds.name: Sunflower Seeds
seeds.description: Plant in summer or fall. Takes 8 days to produce a large sunflower. Yields more seeds at harvest.

seeds.name: Tulip Seeds
seeds.description: Plant in spring. Takes 6 days to produce a colorful flower. Assorted colors.

seeds.name: Wheat Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 4 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.

seeds.name: Yam Seeds
seeds.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 10 days to mature.

other.name: Apple Sapling
other.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apple tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding 'tiles' are empty.

other.name: Apricot Sapling
other.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apricot tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding 'tiles' are empty.

other.name: Basic Fertilizer
other.description: Improves soil quality a little, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.

other.name: Basic Retaining Soil
other.description: This soil has a chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

other.name: Cherry Sapling
other.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Cherry tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding 'tiles' are empty.

other.name: Deluxe Speed-Gro
other.description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 25%. Mix into tilled soil.

other.name: Grass Starter
other.description: Place this on your farm to start a new patch of grass.

other.name: Orange Sapling
other.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Orange tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding 'tiles' are empty.

other.name: Peach Sapling
other.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Peach tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding 'tiles' are empty.

other.name: Pomegranate Sapling
other.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Pomegranate tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding 'tiles' are empty.

other.name: Quality Fertilizer
other.description: Improves soil quality, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.

other.name: Quality Retaining Soil
other.description: This soil has a good chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

other.name: Speed-Gro
other.description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 10%. Mix into tilled soil.
